CdnIp.description:
是否属于阿里云CDN节点。

- **True**：属于。

- **False**：不属于。

400.errorMessage: The specified value of parameter IP is not supported.

responseDemo:
[{"type":"json","example":"{
  "CdnIp": "True",
  "RequestId": "123847FA-9A00-4426-83B8-B4B45D475930",
  "RegionEname": "China-Guizhou-guiyang",
  "Region": "中国-贵州省-贵阳市",
  "IspEname": "telecom",
  "ISP": "电信"
}","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"<DescribeIpInfoResponse>
    <CdnIp>True</CdnIp>
    <RequestId>123847FA-9A00-4426-83B8-B4B45D475930</RequestId>
    <RegionEname>China-Guizhou-guiyang</RegionEname>
    <Region>中国-贵州省-贵阳市</Region>
    <IspEname>telecom</IspEname>
    <ISP>电信</ISP>
</DescribeIpInfoResponse>","errorExample":""}]
title: 查询IP是否为CDN节点
summary: 调用DescribeIpInfo验证指定的IP是否为阿里云CDN节点的IP地址。
